description: You can only send messages to verified destination numbers when your account is in the sandbox. You can add up to 10 verified destination numbers.

parameters.name: DestinationPhoneNumber
parameters.description: The verified destination phone number, in E.164 format.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: An array of tags (key and value pairs) to associate with the destination number. (dict) --- The list of tags to be added to the specified topic. The key identifier, or name, of the tag. The string value associated with the key of the tag.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key identifier, or name, of the tag.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The string value associated with the key of the tag.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: Unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. If you don't specify a client token, a randomly generated token is used for the request to ensure idempotency. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: VerifiedDestinationNumberArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the verified destination phone number.

nested_items.name: VerifiedDestinationNumberId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the verified destination phone number.

nested_items.name: DestinationPhoneNumber
nested_items.description: The verified destination phone number, in E.164 format.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the verified destination phone number.
PENDING: The phone number hasn't been verified yet.
VERIFIED: The phone number is verified and can receive messages.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: An array of tags (key and value pairs) to associate with the destination number.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key identifier, or name, of the tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The string value associated with the key of the tag.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time when the verified phone number was created, in UNIX epoch time format.
